with private - this method not visible:
.UrlMappingsInfoHandlerAdapter
java.lang.IllegalStateException: private static void co.elastic.apm.agent.grails.GrailsTransactionNameInstrumentation$HandlerAdapterAdvice.setTransactionName(java.lang.Object) is not visible to class org.grails.web.mapping.mvc.UrlMappingsInfoHandlerAdapter
	at net.bytebuddy.asm.Advice$Dispatcher$Delegating$Resolved.bind(Advice.java:8887) ~[byte-buddy-dep-1.10.12.jar:?]
setTransactionName has to remain public but I think setName can be private.
